<<<<<<< HEAD
An account of Mr. Ferguson, his common-place-book in two letters. Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680. Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
[2], 35 p.
Printed by Andrew Clark for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1675.
Illustrated t.p. Attributed to Joseph Glanvill. Cf. BM. Item at reel 1669:29 identified as Wing F729 (number cancelled). Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library and Bodleian Library. Mr. Glanvill his letter to Mr. Sherlock -- Mr. Sherlock his answer to Mr. Glanvill his letter.
=======

[2], 35 p.
Printed by Andrew Clark for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1675.
Illustrated t.p. Attributed to Joseph Glanvill. Cf. BM. Item at reel 1669:29 identified as Wing F729 (number cancelled). Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library and Bodleian Library. Mr. Glanvill his letter to Mr. Sherlock -- Mr. Sherlock his answer to Mr. Glanvill his letter.
Walter Kettilby
Andrew Clark
